title: Pop!_OS 22.04 now available with updated Ubuntu base and new features
content:
Canonical just released Ubuntu Linux 22.04 last week, with a slew of new features and an extended support period of five years. The post Pop!_OS 22.04 now available with updated Ubuntu base and new features appeared first on XDA.
description: Ubuntu 22.04 arrived last year with a bunch of new features, and now Pop!_OS Linux has been updated to use the same packages.
